ci.description: Full CI pipeline (all checks in parallel where possible)

install.command: mkdir -p ~/.local/bin && cargo build --release && cp target/release/intent ~/.local/bin/intent && chmod +x ~/.local/bin/intent && echo '✅ Installed intent to ~/.local/bin/intent'
